name: WinMo
description: Multi-chain DeFi portfolio DApp supporting Ethereum and Solana. Browse 100+ tradeable assets (stocks, crypto, commodities, bonds, forex), get swap quotes, view yield farming opportunities, and manage portfolio holdings.

skills.name: List Assets
skills.description: List tradeable assets by category. Returns array of assets with id, name, symbol, price, change24h, category, subcategory, logo, and provider information.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Asset category: stocks, crypto, commodities, or bonds

parameters.name: subcategory
parameters.description: Subcategory filter. Stocks: pre-ipo, large-cap, mid-cap, small-cap, etf. Crypto: large-cap, mid-cap, small-cap. Commodities: precious-metals, energy, industrial, broad. Bonds: treasury, corporate, clo.

returns.items: Asset objects with id, name, symbol, price, change24h, category, subcategory, logo, providers

skills.name: Get Asset Detail
skills.description: Get full detail for a single asset including description, news, on-chain providers, and supported chains.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Asset ID (e.g. btc, nvda, gold, tlt)

returns.description: Asset with description, news array, providers array, and chains array

skills.name: Get Live Prices
skills.description: Get live crypto prices for 50+ tokens from CoinGecko. Returns a map of symbol to price and 24h change.

skills.name: Get Yield Protocols
skills.description: Get yield farming protocols with APY, TVL, risk level, strategy description, and DeFi Llama pool ID.

parameters.name: riskLevel
parameters.description: Filter by risk: safe, low, high-yield, or speculative

returns.items: Protocol objects with id, name, protocol, network, apy, totalDeposits, riskLevel, strategy

skills.name: Get Swap Quote
skills.description: Get a swap quote from Jupiter (Solana) or KyberSwap (Ethereum). Returns route details and expected output amount.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Source token symbol (e.g. USDC, ETH, SOL)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Destination token symbol (e.g. ETH, BTC, NVDA)

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount of source token to swap

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Chain to execute on: solana or ethereum

returns.description: Quote with inputAmount, outputAmount, route details, and price impact

skills.name: Search Assets
skills.description: Fuzzy search all assets and forex pairs by name or symbol.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query (e.g. bitcoin, nvidia, gold, eur)

skills.name: Get Forex Rates
skills.description: Get live forex rates from Pyth Network oracles for 25+ currency pairs including majors, crosses, and exotics.

returns.description: Map of pair (e.g. EUR/USD) -> { price, confidence, publishTime }

skills.name: Get Swappable Tokens
skills.description: Get swappable token addresses for a category and chain. Useful for building swap transactions.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Asset category: stocks, crypto, commodities, or bonds

returns.items: Token objects with id, name, symbol, address, decimals, logo

methods.name: getBalance
methods.description: Get single token balance (requires connected wallet)
